comments:
I am using standard eclipse (Classic 3.3.1 with web tools). 
When I execute an plug-in using eclipse, the started eclipse works for
about 15-20 seconds, and then hangs for about 60 seconds, then a
stack dump for a mylyn related error appears in the host eclipse console.

This doesn't happen in the host eclipse. 

I have anecdotal evidence that the same is happening for two other users
with the same set up as me.

The stack dump is:

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: ""
	at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Long.parseLong(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Long.parseLong(Unknown Source)

	at java.text.DecimalFormat.parse(Unknown Source)
	at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.subParse(Unknown Source)
	at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.parse(Unknown Source)
	at java.text.DateFormat.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.context.core.SaxContextContentHandler.createEventFromAttributes(SaxContextContentHandler.java:82)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.context.core.SaxContextContentHandler.startElement(SaxContextContentHandler.java:62)
	at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.startElement(Unknown Source)

	at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.context.core.SaxContextReader.readContext(SaxContextReader.java:59)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.context.core.InteractionContextExternalizer.readContextFromXML(InteractionContextExternalizer.java:132)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:3659)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:3296)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:2389)

Mik, is there chance that InteractionContextExternalizer.DATE_FORMAT could be requested from more then one thread? Class SimpleDateFormat is not thread safe.

Grahame: while I investigate, could you try to update to the latest version of Mylyn and let me know if, when, or how often this occurs?

http://www.eclipse.org/mylyn/downloads/
updated to latest everything, Mylyn 2.2.0.I20071010-2020. No evidence of the problem.

Thanks Grahame.

Will investigate further as per Eugene's comment#1.
Grahame: if you see this again please reopen.  However, we should now be recovering gracefully from such failures by dismissing the malformed interaction event.
